scenario_text.value: Kew, kew...
Kunemon, are you okay?! Say something!
Kew...kewkewww!

Oh, man... I’m so freaked out I can’t even
tell what you’re saying. Normally I’d know...

Dammit! I bet one of the others would cruise
through a problem like this, no sweat.

I don’t got the brains for that... All I can
do is brute force my way through!

Hey, loser! Come get a piece of me! You’re
going down!
Kew...kew...!
Kunemon! That’s enough! You stay out of this!

Don’t force it, man. I can protect you at
least...

Kunemon... You got me better than anyone. You
were...my best friend.
Kew...kewww...

Now, I’ve had enough of this! Let’s go!
You’re gonna pay for what you did to Kunemon!

I ain’t gonna let anyone lay a damn finger on
my little buddy!
Kewwwy! Kew...keeew...!
Kunemon?! Yo, you all right, Kunemon?!
No, wait... Could it be?!
Gyeeeeee!!!
*huff* *huff* *huff*...!
Kune...mon?
Ryo...it’s all right! I can still...do this!
You...
